# Statistical analysis

1. Copy and paste your conceptual model below. 
```{r}
library(rTisane)
# Add here
```

2. Query for a statistical model using your conceptual model.
```{r}
# Copy and paste above 
# Replace <conceptualModel> with the conceptual model's variable name
# Replace <iv> with an independent variable of interest
# Replace <dv> with the dependent variable of interest. In this case, the variable for income. 
script <- query(concpetualModel=<conceptualModel>, iv=<iv>, <dv>)
```

3. Run your program! Hit the green play button on the first code cell containing your conceptual model.

4. Open, edit, and run your statistical modeling script! 

5. Summarize the results of your analysis.
